The Vendors page manages all service providers and payment recipients in your trust account system.

Adding Vendors

Click "Add New Vendor" to create records for lawyers, doctors, hospitals, or other service providers. Specify vendor type for proper categorization.

Vendor Types

Vendors can be categorized as:

  • Lawyers: Legal counsel and attorneys
  • Doctors: Medical professionals
  • Hospitals: Medical facilities
  • Clients: When clients receive payments
  • Other: Miscellaneous service providers
Actions
  • View: See vendor details and payment history
  • Edit: Update vendor information
  • Delete: Remove vendor (only if no payments made)
